# Prove API

## API Endpoints

### 1. Request Receipt Proof

**Endpoint:** `proof.sepolia.polymer.zone`

**Method:** `POST`

#### Request Header
```
Authorization: Bearer <token>
```

#### Request Body
```
{
  “jsonrpc”: “2.0”,
  “id”:      1,
  "method":  "receipt_requestProof",
  "params":  [uint32, uint32, uint64, uint32]
}
```

#### Request Parameters in order
